4308650.name: Rocky Idle Demo
4308650.description:
A small Demo of the game, hope you enjoy it!

Rocky Idle is a single-player idle/incremental game. Level up your skills, gather resources, and craft powerful combat gear to defeat the strongest bosses and complete your collection log.

ğŸ› ï¸ Skilling That Improves With Use

  • There are skills like Mining, Woodcutting, Crafting, and more.

  • Each skill serves its own purpose, use the rocks mined to smith stronger gear, and increase your max hit.Â 

  • The more you use a resource, the stronger and more efficient it becomes, improving speed, loot multipliers, and active boosts.

ğŸŒ± Background Farming & Passive Activities

  • Farming, and questing all run passively in the background once started.

  • Plant and harvest crops to produce valuable ingredients and materials that can be sold or used to craft potions.

  • The more you harvest, the more efficient your crops become, growing faster and yielding higher rewards over time.

ğŸ§© Contracts

  • ContractsÂ are rare drops from skilling and combat.

  • Complete specific tasks (e.g. gathering or combat) to receive keys

ğŸ•’ğŸ’¤Â Offline progress

  • Keep progressing even while youâ€™re away or asleep.

  • When you return, get a detailed summary of all the resources gathered, skills trained, and rewards earned during your downtime.

âš”ï¸ Automated Combat & Collection

  • Use your crafted gear, food and potions in automated battles.

  • The more you fight, the stronger your gear and boosts become.

  • Defeat monsters to fill your collection log and unlock powerful upgrades.

  • Good luck getting little Rocky's Apron drop, it's quite rare.
